title: Minecraft Fun Gadgets Plugin
shortDescription: A fun gadgets plugin with fun gadgets such as paint gun, launcher items etc.
description: A Java-based Minecraft plugin implementing a complete fun gadgets plugin. Such as paint guns at different radius, right-click to launch items, launching carpets by color and much more.
reason: One day, I've decided that I'm gonna build my own Minecraft server, so I had to learn how to develop plugins. And this was a great place to start!
